oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Open the Jail Gates or We Will Shut the Mill Gates
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fred Wright
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Labor History, Strikes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: First Panel: Rally. Second Panel: Picketers for Ettor and Giovannetti. Third Panel: American Woolen Company President William Wood at desk covered in newspapers detailing his plot to dynamite his mill.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Fred Wright Original Cartoons (Subgroup 13.1), Fred Wright Papers (UE.13)
